name: AgapÃ©
headline: Feel close, even when apart. One meaningful conversation at a time.
description: AgapÃ© is a relationship wellness app that helps you feel close to your friends, family, or partner, even when apart! We curate daily questions to spark meaningful conversations for over 2 million people around the world.

founders.name: Kadie Okwudili, Founder
founders.description: Building the new way to say, "I love you" to make & keep billions happy.

founders.name: Ron Rogge, Founder
founders.description: I am a professor of clinical psychology at the University of Rochester and a leading couples and family researcher with over 25 years of experience. My program of research on methods of strengthening relationships has led to over 75 peer-reviewed research articles and interviews on national news programs like the Today Show and Good Morning America. It is that research that helped guide the creation of Agape.

# 1000s of couples make every day special with Daily Agapé.
Using Daily Agapé is like starting every morning with a love note from your partner. I would recommend it to every couple, it’s that great!
John & Michelle Bryant
30 years in love
Daily Agapé has honestly changed our lives. I would have never imagined something so simple to be so impactful.
Emily & Mark
2 years in love
Every couple should set aside time for relationship wellness. Agapé makes that not only easy but fun!
Sarah & Tom
12 years in love
Daily Agapé
# Perfect for Long Distance Couples Too
# Why Agapé
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e680e3570623f02f53e91d6_icon-1.svg)
Fun + Easy
A game that strengthens your relationship in just 5 minutes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e680e35ba4c6f0e60609552_icon-2.svg)
Research
Questions are crafted using over 20 years of relationship research.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e680e355aa1945d8e74e608_icon-3.svg)
Personalized
Our algorithm personalizes the questions to you and your relationship.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e680e35c964bd0515ef51ef_icon-4.svg)
Effective
Wellness checks to see the positive changes in your relationship.
# FAQ
[What is Agapé?](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[What does "Agapé" mean?](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[What types of questions will be asked?](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[What is relationship wellness?](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Can I use Agapé without my partner?](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)[Can I use Agapé if I'm single?](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-5>)[Is Agapé free?](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-6>)[Is Agapé effective?](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-7>)[Is Agapé a couples therapy app?](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-8>)[How does Agapé keep my info safe?](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-9>)[How do points and monthly giveaways work?](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-10>)[Who creates the questions?](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-11>)
What is Agapé?
Agapé is the new way to say, "I love you" that will make + keep billions happy. With just 1 question a day, you can nurture a happy, mindful, beautiful life.As the #1 relationship wellness app for couples, Agapé makes it easy for you to feel + show love.
What does "Agapé" mean?
Love is a very multidimensional construct, which is why the Ancient Greeks were wise enough to describe it using several words. One of which is Agapé, which represents an unconditional, sacrificial love. Agapé is selfless love put into action. The highest form of love.Fun Fact: In English speaking countries Agapé is pronounced "ah-gah-pay" but if you go to Greece it's pronounced "Ah-gah-pee". It's unclear why the pronunciation changed, but we went with "ah-gah-pay" hence the accent on the e!
What types of questions will be asked?
We use a complex machine learning algorithm to personalize the questions we send to you, which will only get better over time. We send a huge range of questions. From reminiscing to funny. We even send spicy questions if you opt in! Agapé is designed to be fun.
What is relationship wellness?
Relationship wellness is the process of actively shifting your mindset, making choices, and pursuing activities to strengthen and enrich your relationships. A common misconception is that relationship wellness is best suited for couples who are experiencing some sort of dysfunction. But just like the gym isn't exclusive to individuals who are out of shape, relationship wellness should not be limited to couples who have relationship issues.All couples should be actively practicing relationship wellness. Agapé makes that both easy AND fun.
Can I use Agapé without my partner?
You are able to add memories to Agapé without your partner. However, our questions are only available if you're paired.[](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<https:/airtable.com/shr7djjIrUyZLz4cC>)
Can I use Agapé if I'm single?
Not at this time.
Is Agapé free?
Agapé is free to download and free to use. Not only do we send a free daily question, but you can answer unlimited questions for any of our core categories, like Gratitude and Learning. However, there are premium features that you can access with a subscription.We have a free and premium version of the app. It is important to us that you can benefit from Agapé even if you can't afford to support us financially.
Is Agapé effective?
Agapé was developed using over 30 YEARS of relationship research. Our preliminary studies indicate that over 93% of couples see benefits from using Agapé. We are consistently measuring the effectiveness of our service, with the goal of helping couples both feel and show love.[](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<https:/www.researchgate.net/profile/Ronald_Rogge2>)
Is Agapé a couples therapy app?
No. Agapé isn’t therapy. Couples therapy is focused on solving a problem. Agapé is focused on creating a fun way to spark meaningful conversation.Often times that conversation makes you smile. Occasionally you may even cry tears of joy. And sometimes it even solves problems! But the primary goal is to create a fun way to spark meaningful conversation, which is fundamentally different than couples therapy.
How does Agapé keep my info safe?
Agapé values your privacy. Our app and web services use bank-level 128 bit encryption to securely transmit data between your device and our servers. Customer data stored in our databases is logically isolated and encrypted. To further keep your personal data safe, we employ extensive security measures to minimize access.
How do points and monthly giveaways work?
Our Point Based Rewards System is designed to encourage relationship strengthening behaviors. So the more you engage with Agapé the more points you earn.Currently, you earn points for the length of your responses and how quickly you respond to the daily questions. You also get bonuses for how often you respond. For example, if you respond 7 days in a row that's an extra 10 points!100 points can be redeemed as 1 entry into our monthly giveaways. The winner is randomly selected from the available entries.No purchase necessary to win. A purchase will not improve your chances of winning. See terms and conditions for more details.
Who creates the questions?
All of our questions are vetted by our Chief Research Officer, Ronald Rogge PhD. Ron has been researching romantic relationships for over 20 years, currently serving as a professor of clinical psychology at the prestigious University of Rochester.[Please view his work here.](https://www.getdailyagape.com/<https:/www.researchgate.net/profile/Ronald_Rogge2>)

So the more you engage with Agapé the more points you earn.Currently, you earn points for the length of your responses and how quickly you respond to the daily questions. You also get bonuses for how often you respond. For example, if you respond 7 days in a row that's an extra 10 points!100 points can be redeemed as 1 entry into our monthly giveaways. The winner is randomly selected from the available entries.No purchase necessary to win. A purchase will not improve your chances of winning. See terms and conditions for more details.
Who creates the questions?
All of our questions are vetted by our Chief Research Officer, Ronald Rogge PhD. Ron has been researching romantic relationships for over 20 years, currently serving as a professor of clinical psychology at the prestigious University of Rochester.Please view his work here.⟨19⟩
### What is Agapé?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e629430b6815f53461c4767_arrow-right.svg)
What is Agapé?
Agapé is the new way to say, "I love you" that will make + keep billions happy. With just 1 question a day, you can nurture a happy, mindful, beautiful life. You start your day with a daily question to spark meaningful conversation. When you and your partner both respond, you are able to see each other's responses.Agapé is the #1 relationship wellness app for couples.
### What does "Agapé" mean?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e629430b6815f53461c4767_arrow-right.svg)
What does "Agapé" mean?
Love is a very multidimensional construct, which is why the Ancient Greeks were wise enough to describe it using several words. One of which is Agapé, which represents an unconditional, sacrificial love. Agapé is selfless love put into action. The highest form of love.Fun Fact: In English speaking countries Agapé is pronounced "ah-gah-pay" but if you go to Greece it's pronounced "Ah-gah-pee". It's unclear why the pronunciation changed, but we went with "ah-gah-pay" hence the accent on the e!
### What types of questions will be asked?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e629430b6815f53461c4767_arrow-right.svg)
What types of questions will be asked?
We use a complex machine learning algorithm to personalize the questions we send to you, which will only get better over time. We send a huge range of questions. From reminiscing to funny. We even send spicy questions if you opt in! Agapé is designed to be fun.
### What is relationship wellness?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e629430b6815f53461c4767_arrow-right.svg)
What is relationship wellness?
Relationship wellness is the process of actively shifting your mindset, making choices, and pursuing activities to strengthen and enrich your relationships.A common misconception is that relationship wellness is best suited for couples who are experiencing some sort of dysfunction. But just like the gym isn't exclusive to individuals who are out of shape, relationship wellness should not be limited to couples who have relationship issues.All couples should be actively practicing relationship wellness. Agapé makes that both easy AND fun.
### Can I use Agapé without my partner?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e629430b6815f53461c4767_arrow-right.svg)
Can I use Agapé without my partner?
You are able to add memories to Agapé without your partner. However, our questions are only available if you're paired.
### Can I use Agapé if I'm single?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e629430b6815f53461c4767_arrow-right.svg)
Can I use Agapé if I'm single?
Not at this time.
### Is Agapé free?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e629430b6815f53461c4767_arrow-right.svg)
Is Agapé free?
Agapé is free to download and free to use. Not only do we send a free daily question, but you can answer unlimited questions for any of our core categories, like Gratitude and Learning. However, there are premium features that you can access with a subscription.We have a free and premium version of the app. It is important to us that you can benefit from Agapé even if you can't afford to support us financially.
START TODAY⟨3⟩
### Is Agapé effective?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e629430b6815f53461c4767_arrow-right.svg)
Is Agapé effective?
Agapé was developed using over 30 YEARS of relationship research. Our preliminary studies indicate that 97% of couples see benefits from using Agapé. We are consistently measuring the effectiveness of our service, with the goal of helping couples both feel and show love.
### Is Agapé a couples therapy app?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e629430b6815f53461c4767_arrow-right.svg)
Is Agapé a couples therapy app?
No. Agapé isn’t therapy. Couples therapy is focused on solving a problem. Agapé is focused on creating a fun way to spark meaningful conversation.Often times that conversation makes you smile. Occasionally you may even cry tears of joy. And sometimes it even solves problems! But the primary goal is to create a fun way to spark meaningful conversation, which is fundamentally different than couples therapy.
### How does Agapé keep my info safe?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e629430b6815f53461c4767_arrow-right.svg)
How does Agapé keep my info safe?
Agapé values your privacy. Our app and web services use bank-level 128 bit encryption to securely transmit data between your device and our servers. Customer data stored in our databases is logically isolated and encrypted. To further keep your personal data safe, we employ extensive security measures to minimize access.
### How do points and monthly giveaways work?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e629430b6815f53461c4767_arrow-right.svg)
How do points and monthly giveaways work?
Our Point Based Rewards System is designed to encourage relationship strengthening behaviors. So the more you engage with Agapé the more points you earn.Currently, you earn points for the length of your responses and how quickly you respond to the daily questions. You also get bonuses for how often you respond. For example, if you respond 7 days in a row that's an extra 10 points!100 points can be redeemed as 1 entry into our monthly giveaways. The winner is randomly selected from the available entries.No purchase necessary to win. A purchase will not improve your chances of winning. See terms and conditions for more details.
### Who creates the questions?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e6126c70168605e1f969bac/5e629430b6815f53461c4767_arrow-right.svg)
Who creates the questions?
All of our questions are vetted by our Chief Research Officer, Ronald Rogge PhD. Ron has been researching romantic relationships for over 20 years, currently serving as a professor of clinical psychology at the prestigious University of Rochester.Please view his work here.⟨19⟩

generated_description:
**Agapé: A Relationship Wellness App**

**Mission**: Feel close, even when apart. One meaningful conversation at a time.

Founded as part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, Agapé is a relationship wellness app designed to help you cultivate meaningful connections with friends, family, and partners, especially during times of separation. With over 2 million users globally, Agapé provides daily curated questions that spark meaningful conversations.

### What Does Agapé Do?
Agapé operates on a simple yet powerful principle: daily engagement leads to deeper connections. Every day, it prompts users with a personalized question designed to encourage dialogue. After both individuals respond, they can see each other's thoughts, fostering intimacy and understanding.

#### Key Features:
- **Daily Questions**: Users receive engaging prompts that vary from reflective to humorous, aimed at nurturing relationships.
- **Point-Based Rewards System**: By responding to questions, users can earn points that lead to free rewards, further motivating engagement.
- **Research-Backed**: Questions are created using over 20 years of relationship research, ensuring they are not only fun but effective. The app claims that 97% of couples see benefits from their interactions.

### Why Agapé?
Agapé isn’t just for couples facing issues—it's for everyone who wants to maintain or enhance their relationship wellness. Just like a workout routine helps keep physical health in check, cultivating relationships needs regular attention. 

### Accessibility and Use:
- **Availability**: Agapé is free to download with an option for a premium subscription that unlocks additional features. The goal is to make relationship nurturing easy, regardless of financial capability.
- **User Experience**: It’s designed to be fun and engaging, taking mere minutes each day to actively improve connection and understanding.

### Team and Location:
Agapé is based in Rochester, NY, and is comprised of a small but dedicated team of six employees, guided by their commitment to enhancing relationship wellness across the globe.

### Founder Insight:
The concept taps into a uniquely human experience—our relationships. By creating a platform that combines technology and emotional insight, Agapé strives to redefine how we connect and communicate amidst the complexities of modern life.

For more information, visit [Agapé's website](https://www.getdailyagape.com). Explore how a simple question can lead to deeper connections and a healthier relationship. 

---

In a nutshell, Agapé provides a thoughtful way to engage with those who matter most, ensuring that distance doesn't dilute connection. It’s not just about saving relationships; it’s about enriching them.
